Siphiwe Gloria Ndlovu (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1977) bụ onye mba Zimbabwe na-ede akwụkwọ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ ya ma o tolite na obodo Bulawayo
Ọnwa ole na ole ka a mụsịrị ya, ezinụlọ Ndlovu kwagara Sweden dị ka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ bụkwa ebe a ka ọ nọrọ afọ ndụ ya
Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara mba United States, wee laghachi Zimbabwe mgbe afọ 1980 gasịrị mgbe mba ahụ nwetara nnwere onwe ya

Ọ gara Girls College ma mesịa gaa US ịga gụọ akwụkwọ mahadum ya na Boston, Massachusetts (Emerson College); Athens, Ohio (Ohio University) na Palo Alto, California (Stanford University). Ọ nọrọ afọ iri na asatọ na US, tupu o kpebie ịlaghachi Africa ebe ọ bi n'etiti mba  South Africa nakwa mba Zimbabwe.
Akụkọ ifo Ndlovu enwetawo otuto dị egwu kemgbe ọ banyere n'ebe ahụ n'afọ 2018

Akwụkwọ izizi ya, The Theory of Flight (2018) sochiri The History of Man (2020) n'oge na-adịghị anya.  Akwụkwọ abụọ ahụ enwetala otuto, mee ya na ndepụta dị mkpirikpi, ma nweta ebe ndị edemede ha na ụlọ ọrụ ndị a ma ama gburugburu ụwa. E wezụga edemede okike, Ndlovu bụ ọkà mmụta edemede a zụrụ azụ. Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri ya amalitela na Zanzibar International Film Festival n'etiti ndị ọzọ.
